title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm registration success message and redirect to profile or home page.

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Check registration fails when an invalid email address is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter a valid username, invalid email format, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that an email validation error is shown and registration is blocked.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that existing users can login with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered email and password.
Click on login button.
Confirm the user is logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure login is denied when an incorrect password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid registered email and incorrect password.
Click on login button.
Verify login fails and an appropriate error message is displayed.

title: View Book Catalog and AI-Generated Covers
description: Validate that the book catalog loads with all 347 books showing AI-generated covers correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the book catalog page.
Confirm 347 books are displayed.
Verify that each book displays a unique AI-generated cover image.

title: Search Books by Title
description: Verify search functionality returns correct books matching the entered title keywords.

steps.description: Navigate to the book catalog page.
Enter a partial or full book title in the search bar.
Execute the search.
Confirm results contain only books matching the search criteria.

title: Filter Books by Category
description: Ensure category filtering returns only books belonging to selected categories.

steps.description: Navigate to the book catalog page.
Select one or more categories from the filter options.
Verify that displayed books belong only to the selected categories.

title: Open Book Detail and Load PDF Reader
description: Validate that opening a book detail page loads the PDF reader with the correct book content.

steps.description: Select a book from the catalog and navigate to its detail page.
Verify that the AI-generated cover, book title, author, and metadata are displayed.
Open the PDF reader for the book.
Check that the PDF loads correctly and pages render visually.

title: PDF Reader Single and Two-Page Mode Toggle
description: Verify the PDF reader toggles correctly between single-page and two-page modes.

steps.description: Open a book in the PDF reader.
Switch PDF reader to single-page mode.
Confirm only one page is shown at a time.
Switch PDF reader to two-page mode.
Confirm two pages are visible side-by-side.

title: PDF Reader Full-Screen Mode
description: Ensure the PDF reader supports toggling to and from full-screen mode correctly.

steps.description: Open a book in the PDF reader.
Activate full-screen mode using the UI control.
Verify PDF reader occupies full screen without UI obstruction.
Exit full-screen mode.
Confirm PDF reader returns to normal view.

title: Page Curl Animation in PDF Reader
description: Verify the page-curl animation is displayed smoothly when navigating pages in the PDF reader.

steps.description: Open a book in the PDF reader.
Navigate to next and previous pages using navigation buttons.
Observe smooth page curl animation during page transitions.

title: Bookmark a Book with Status 'Plan to Read'
description: Check that a user can bookmark a book and mark its status as 'Plan to Read'.

steps.description: Login and navigate to a book detail page.
Add the book to bookmarks with status 'Plan to Read'.
Verify bookmark is saved and appears in user's bookmarks list under 'Plan to Read'.

title: Update Bookmark Status to 'Reading'
description: Verify the user can change a book's bookmark status to 'Reading' and it updates correctly.

steps.description: Locate a bookmarked book in 'Plan to Read' status.
Change bookmark status to 'Reading'.
Confirm bookmark status updates and is reflected in the bookmarks UI.

title: Bookmark Persistence Across Sessions
description: Ensure bookmarks and their statuses persist after user logout and subsequent login.

steps.description: Login and bookmark several books with various statuses.
Logout from the application.
Login again with the same user.
Verify all previously set bookmarks and statuses are present and correct.

title: Automatic Reading History Tracking
description: Check the system automatically records reading history and progress as the user reads a book.

steps.description: Login and open a book in PDF reader.
Navigate through multiple pages noting reading progress.
Verify reading history is updated with current page and timestamp.

title: Retrieve and Display User Reading History
description: Ensure the reading history page shows all books read with correct progress and timestamps.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the reading history page.
Verify the reading history lists all books with correct last read pages and times.

title: Light/Dark Theme Toggle and System Preference Detection
description: Verify the UI can switch between light and dark themes manually and auto-detect system preference.

steps.description: Load the website with system preference for light mode.
Confirm UI initially displays light theme.
Toggle theme manually to dark mode using UI control.
Verify UI updates to dark mode instantly.
Change system preference to dark mode and reload app.
Confirm UI auto-switches to dark mode on load.

title: Text-to-Speech Playback Controls
description: Check that the text-to-speech feature reads book content clearly and playback controls work as expected.

steps.description: Open a book in the reader supporting text-to-speech.
Start text-to-speech playback.
Confirm audio playback starts and matches displayed text.
Use controls to pause, resume, and stop playback.
Verify controls respond correctly and audio behaves accordingly.

title: Randomize Button Suggests Diverse Books
description: Verify the randomize button returns different book suggestions on multiple clicks.

steps.description: Navigate to the book discovery or catalog page.
Click the randomize button multiple times.
Confirm different random books are suggested each time, without repeats in immediate succession.

title: For You Recommendations Accuracy
description: Ensure the 'For You' section shows related book series relevant to the user's reading history.

steps.description: Login and read a set of books belonging to various series.
Navigate to 'For You' recommendations.
Verify recommended books are related to series the user has shown interest in.

title: Top Recommendations Slider Functionality
description: Validate that the top recommendations slider shows trending books with author info and loops indefinitely.

steps.description: Navigate to home or book catalog page featuring top recommendations.
Verify the slider displays trending books with author info visible.
Interact with slider navigation controls.
Confirm slider loops and cycles through all trending items continuously.

title: Admin Panel Access Control
description: Verify only users with admin privileges can access the admin panel page successfully.

steps.description: Login as a non-admin user and attempt to access the admin panel URL.
Confirm access is denied or redirected appropriately.
Login as an admin user and access the admin panel URL.
Verify admin panel loads with full management features.

title: Admin Panel Book Management
description: Ensure admin can add, edit, and remove books from the library via the admin panel.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to admin panel.
Add a new book with all required details and AI-generated cover.
Confirm new book appears in catalog.
Edit an existing bookâ€™s details and save changes.
Verify updates reflect in the catalog and detail pages.
Delete a book from the admin panel.
Confirm the book is removed from catalog and user views.

title: System Error Handling and Fallback UI
description: Ensure the system gracefully recovers from errors such as failed API calls and shows fallback UI to maintain stable user sessions.

steps.description: Simulate an API failure when fetching book catalog data.
Verify fallback message and retry option are shown without crashing the app.
Simulate authentication server downtime during login.
Confirm user sees informative error and can retry login later.
